attributes.action: For the right to meet a police officer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For a police officer to deny and being able to deny an informal meeting with a citizen when there is a complaint against him/her willing to arrive to a local resolution is a non-sense and should not be allowed. We believe to be now well accepted that the aim of the complaint system is to ascertain why and how something went “wrong” to correct it from happening again and to resolve dissatisfaction with a service whenever possible.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
